title: ADTRE-Based Instructional Design Competency Assessment Course for Preservice Science Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Basic science education theories, ADTRE model concepts, and science subject matter knowledge
context.additional_context: Developing instructional design competencies through reflection and feedback in a smartphone-centered restricted technology environment

learning_goals: Can systematically execute a science lesson design process following the ADTRE (Analysis-Design-Teaching-Revision-Evaluation) model
Can continuously improve instructional design competencies through reflective journals and peer feedback
Can develop lesson plans reflecting real classroom situations in simulation/VR environments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
